name: Elemental Dice
description:
Challenge the elements! Play with fire, water, ice and stone. Match dice to solve puzzles or race the clock to make as many matches as you can. Earn Familiars with powers to help you. Connect to Game Center to unlock awards and see which of your friends have achieved mastery!

Elemental Dice features:
• Practice, Stone, Water, and Fire levels.
• A beat the clock game with four levels of difficulty.
• Fire, Water, and Stone familiars.
• Game Center connectivity.
